languages.text: "Ты узнаешь... со временем", {n}— культист улыбается жутковатой улыбкой, расцвеченной свежей кровью на губах.{/n}
"You will know... in time." {n}The cultist gives you a wicked smile painted with the fresh blood on his lips.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ты узнаешь... со временем", {n}— культист улыбается жутковатой улыбкой, расцвеченной свежей кровью на губах.{/n}

languages.text: “到时候……你就明白了。”{n}这个邪教徒对你露出了邪恶的笑容，嘴唇上沾着鲜血。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You will know... in time." {n}The cultist gives you a wicked smile painted with the fresh blood on his lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “到时候……你就明白了。”{n}这个邪教徒对你露出了邪恶的笑容，嘴唇上沾着鲜血。{/n}
traits.speaker: CultistLeaderSororitasQuest

languages.text: «Lo sabréis... a su debido tiempo». {n}El sectario te lanza una sonrisa retorcida y teñida de rojo por la sangre de sus labios.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You will know... in time." {n}The cultist gives you a wicked smile painted with the fresh blood on his lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Lo sabréis... a su debido tiempo». {n}El sectario te lanza una sonrisa retorcida y teñida de rojo por la sangre de sus labios.{/n}
traits.speaker: CultistLeaderSororitasQuest

languages.text: 「やがて…わかるだろう」{n}教団信者は、唇についた鮮血で塗られた邪悪な笑みをあなたに向ける。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You will know... in time." {n}The cultist gives you a wicked smile painted with the fresh blood on his lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「やがて…わかるだろう」{n}教団信者は、唇についた鮮血で塗られた邪悪な笑みをあなたに向ける。{/n}
traits.speaker: CultistLeaderSororitasQuest

languages.text: "Das werdet Ihr erfahren ... beizeiten." {n}Der Kultist lächelt dich bösartig an, die Lippen verschmiert mit frischem Blut.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You will know... in time." {n}The cultist gives you a wicked smile painted with the fresh blood on his lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Das werdet Ihr erfahren ... beizeiten." {n}Der Kultist lächelt dich bösartig an, die Lippen verschmiert mit frischem Blut.{/n}
traits.speaker: CultistLeaderSororitasQuest

languages.text: « Vous le découvrirez bien assez tôt. » {n}Le cultiste vous lance un sourire malveillant coloré par le sang frais sur ses lèvres.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You will know... in time." {n}The cultist gives you a wicked smile painted with the fresh blood on his lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vous le découvrirez bien assez tôt. » {n}Le cultiste vous lance un sourire malveillant coloré par le sang frais sur ses lèvres.{/n}

languages.text: "Öğreneceksin... Zamanı geldiğinde..." {n}Tarikatçı sana bakarak şeytanca sırıtıyor. Sırıtışı, taze kanla kaplı dişlerini gözler önüne seriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You will know... in time." {n}The cultist gives you a wicked smile painted with the fresh blood on his lips.{/n}
